about_the_game:
Find your way in an open-world cyberpunk racing game, where every crossroad is a new opportunity to thrive. Explore a fleshed-out city, join underground car races, hunt and outsmart other players, collect your prizes, and never stop driving.

Street racers vs. Cops

Join the never-ending confrontation between outlaws and police. Choose either role and switch between them as often as you want.

  • Thrive as a street racer. Participate in non-linear, open-world races throughout the city and evade cops using speed and stealth.

  • Hunt as a cop. Rely on cooperation, city expertise, and tools to capture Street Racers.

Outsmart cops using stealth

To avoid getting caught by the cops as a street racer, you can rely not just on raw speed to outrun them, but also on clever stealth tactics to stay hidden and out of sight.

  • Blend into traffic. Stay incognito by driving alongside regular city traffic. Disappear into the flow of vehicles, hide in plain sight, and avoid unwanted attention from the Cops.

  • Engine cut-off. Turn off your engine and park to mimic a stationary car. By blending into the environment, you can evade detection.

  • Strategic evasion. Use hidden routes, back alleys, and less-traveled streets to shake off pursuers. The open-world city is packed with shortcuts and sneaky spots designed for stealthy escapes.

Hunt street racers

As a cop, your mission is to track down outlaw street racers tearing through the city. With the tools at your disposal, you have everything you need to succeed.

  • Speed Cameras. Use speed cameras strategically placed around the city to track down racers. These cameras capture high-speed vehicles, helping you pinpoint their location and plan your next move.

  • Spike Strips. Deploy spike strips to disable racer cars during chases. Timing and placement are key. If you get it right, you can turn the tide of a pursuit in an instant.

  • Cooperation. Work with your fellow cops to corner and outmaneuver the racers. By coordinating efforts, flanking, setting traps, and planning together, you increase your chances of catching drivers who rely on speed and stealth to escape.

Partake in non-linear races

In REV UP, races are unpredictable and all about adaptability.

  • Dynamic races with no set path. Races in REV UP are dynamic, with starting lines appearing randomly in different locations across the city. The finish line is revealed when the race begins. Rely on your knowledge of the city to choose your route, and decide how to navigate through shortcuts, hidden paths, and destructible barriers to outpace your rivals.

  • Risk vs. Reward. As you win races, your rewards grow exponentially. But remember that each victory also raises your bounty, making you a bigger target for cops. Weigh the risk of being hunted against the temptation for greater rewards. When you’re ready to end your winning streak, cash out by extracting from the city to secure your earnings.

  • Non-Linear and Strategic Gameplay. With no fixed track and dynamically chosen finish lines, each race demands quick thinking and adaptability. Evaluate the risks of your chosen path while considering traffic, patrols, and potential shortcuts. Your ultimate goal is to win as many races as possible and successfully extract from the city without getting caught.

Car customization

Enhance your car with performance upgrades and visual designs to match your style and strategy. Choose a sleek, understated look, or bold, attention-grabbing finishes to stand out. Flashier cars offer bonus rewards but also draw more attention from cops, adding an extra layer of strategy to your choices.

Multiplayer and solo modes

In REV UP, you can race online with friends or other players, or go offline and take on AI opponents. Enjoy dynamic races, pursuits, and stealth mechanics in both multiplayer and solo modes.

name: REV UP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600, Core i5-8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570, GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600, Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX5700 (8GB), GeForce RTX 2070 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: A multiplayer arcade racing game with stealth mechanics and car chases, set in an open-world cyberpunk city. As a street racer, escape or hide from cops while taking part in non-linear races. As a cop, hunt down racers by using equipment and teamwork.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
